channel.title: How to?
channel.description:
I have a 317 delta server but i cant find how to change these things: [s]-when dying Spawn point.[/s] [s]-when new Spawn point.[/s] -spell book teleports. [s]-making stairs work.[/s] -adding a command that opens a URL.
If you know how to change one of these please reply!

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @Ninjamovement Ninjamovement
item.description:
@Ninjamovement wrote:

[quote=“RSPS222, post:31, topic:484526”]Dont be dumb if you have a website put the URL IN THERE.
and DELETE THE COMMAND THAT CALLED RL AND THE COMMAND CALL MOPAR
REPLACE WITH THAT COMMAND :
Look at the final command
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Website”)){
String url = “//https://Google.com”;
java.awt.Desktop.getDesktop().browse(java.net.URI. create(url));
}
thats just baiscly opens up google change the url to your website GL![/quote]
still giving me a fucking error !!!

Read full topic

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

To make a command that will make a player open a URL, would be simple.

		            if (playerCommand.equals("Moparscape") && c.playerRights >= 0)  {
	        c.getPA().sendUrl("www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?");
	    }

Something like that. Someone correct my code if it is wrong. GoodLuck!

Read full topic

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

try to learn java?
if(objectId == 1329){//if your ladder id is 1329 thats mean that if the objectid is 1329 this will happen
teleportToX = X; //teleport you to the X position
teleportToY = Y; //teleport you to the Y position
sendMessage(“You went up the stairs.”); //Send a simple message
}
Good?
EDIT : URL IS REALLY EASY!
Do this :
String url = “https://URL@@@@@”;
java.awt.Desktop.getDesktop().browse(java.net.URI. create(url));
TOO EASY JUST GOOGLE!

Read full topic
